Package com.github.wuic.engine

This package contains the definition of an Engine.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DimensionPacker<T> A packer packs a set of dimensions (2d) in the smalled area.
SpriteProvider This interface represents a type of object which provides sprite generation capabilities.
 

Class Summary
Engine An engine is in charge to parse a set of files.
EngineOutputManager This class is in charge to provides directory where the engines must generate their files.
EngineRequest This class represents a request to be indicated to an engine.
PackerEngine Abstract engine which could be extended by engines which uses a packing algorithm with an implementation provided by a DimensionPacker.
Region Represents a region to use when need to specify a sprite.
 

Package com.github.wuic.engine Description

This package contains the definition of an Engine. The possible implementations and factories are located in the sub-packages.

Author:
Guillaume DROUET
